content:
It seems a good resultTranscendental ℤ π has been proved in "#6718". But the API for this classic result doesn't seem to have been pushed to master yet.

Is this easy to prove using the latest library API?
It follows from this lemma that Transcendental ℤ π is equivalent to Transcendental ℚ π. The PR was merged 7 hours ago and the lemma doesn't yet show up in the online docs.

Junyan Xu said:

It follows from this lemma that Transcendental ℤ π is equivalent to Transcendental ℚ π. The PR was merged 7 hours ago and the lemma doesn't yet show up in the online docs.

Thank you for your reply! I will take a careful look once I get free from my semester assignments. :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
